problem: 已知直线m∥n,将一块含30°角的直角三角板ABC按如图方式放置(∠ABC=30°),其中A,B两点分别落在直线m,n上,若∠1=20°,则∠2的度数为()
comment: 本题主要考查平行线的性质,清楚两直线平行,内错角相等是解答本题的关键,
problem_en: Given the straight line ∥ n, place a right-angle triangle ABC with N_0 angle as shown in the figure (∠ABC = N_1), where the two points A and B fall on the straight line, n, if ∠1 = N_2, then ∠2 The degree is ()
